SELECT T1.RNUM, T1.USER_INFO, T1.USER_SEQ, T1.USER_ID, T1.USER_NM, T1.USER_NM_EN, T1.USER_EMAIL
FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY USER_SEQ DESC) AS RNUM, CONCAT(USER_NM, '(', USER_ID, ')') AS USER_INFO, USER_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NM, USER_NM_EN, USER_EMAIL FROM TB_META_USER
WHERE USER_SEQ NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT USER_SEQ FROM TB_META_USER_ROLE_MAPPING) AND ( USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') OR USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') ) ) T1
ORDER BY T1.RNUM DESC

SELECT T1.RNUM, T1.USER_SEQ, T1.USER_ID, T1.USER_NM, T1.USER_NM_EN, T1.USER_EMAIL, T1.USER_ADRS, T1.USER_PHONE, T1.ACT_ST
FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY USER_SEQ ASC) RNUM, USER_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NM, USER_NM_EN, USER_EMAIL, USER_ADRS, USER_PHONE, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CMM_CDDTL WHERE ACT_ST = CODE_CD ) ACT_ST FROM TB_META_USER
WHERE 1=1
) T1
WHERE T1.RNUM BETWEEN ((#{cntPerPage} * (#{curPage}-1)) + 1) AND (#{cntPerPage} * #{curPage})

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM ( SELECT USER_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NM, USER_NM_EN, USER_EMAIL, USER_ADRS, USER_PHONE, ACT_ST FROM TB_META_USER
WHERE 1=1
) T1
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_META_USER SET USER_NM = #{USER_NM}, USER_NM_EN = #{USER_NM_EN}, USER_EMAIL = #{USER_EMAIL}, USER_ADRS = #{USER_ADRS}, USER_PHONE = #{USER_PHONE}, ACT_ST = #{ACT_ST} WHERE USER_SEQ = #{USER_SEQ}
